title: Huge problems with Beta Client on EuW? (It takes 6 minutes from login screen to ranked queue)
body:
Is someone else experiencing this too?

My PC or internet can't be the problem since everything else (Overwatch etc.) works great. This started happening like 2 days ago but I don't see anyone talking about it so I decided to post it.

Here is the video showing whole 6 minutes of waiting for client to actually wake up before I can do basically anything: https://youtu.be/oSrqYSA7C-s

If this breaks any rules of this subreddit please fix it accordingly, thank you c:

Can I fix it somehow? Or is it just a server thing?

Stuff is super weird, keeps happening in game too - weird lag spikes even though my ping is super stable (constant 44)

replies.body: When you enter matchmaking, you need a constant, stable connection in order to get group together and transition over to champion select.  Based on your issue and that you're unable to connect to chat, I believe you may be having some network problems.  My suggestion would be to use the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up and configure your connection for a smooth experience.  I hope it helps!
